item.title: Some item questions
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

So for a couple custom items I added the item is held in the wrong spot EX: Admin cape and here is the init for it incase the problem is in the init

if(i == 13678) {
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anInt174 = 14127; //Inv & Ground
class8.anInt181 = 2000; //Zoom
class8.anInt190 = 572;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = 0;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 14128; //Male
class8.anInt200 = 14128; //Female
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable
class8.aString170 = “Administrator cape”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “Its an administrator cape”.getBytes();
}

Another question I have is how to make a custom godsword held like a godsword
